original_text: Jacob continued to say to Laban, ‘I have worked for you for 20 years. Your female sheep and goats have all safely given birth to young ones. I have not taken any of your male animals as food for myself.
korean_text: 내가 이 이십 년을 외삼촌과 함께 하였거니와 외삼촌의 암양들이나 암염소들이 낙태하지 아니하였고 또 외삼촌의 양 떼의 숫양을 내가 먹지 아니하였으며

sentences.original_text: Jacob continued to say to Laban
I have worked for you for 20 years
Your female sheep and goats have all safely given birth to young ones
sentences.korean_translation: 당신의 암컷 양과 염소들이 모두 안전하게 새끼를 낳았다

sentences.original_text: I have not taken any of your male animals as food for myself
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 당신의 수컷 동물들을 내 음식으로 가져간 적이 없다
